meanings.definition: A North African dish of spit-roasted lamb or other meat.
meanings.sent1: The family gathered around the table to enjoy the delicious mechoui for dinner.
meanings.sent2: The restaurant served traditional mechoui with a side of couscous.
meanings.sent3: At the party, everyone fought over the last piece of mechoui, causing a playful food fight.
meanings.sent4: The aroma of the mechoui filled the air, tempting even the pickiest eaters.
meanings.sent5: The chef's secret spice blend made the mechoui unforgettable.

meanings.definition: The act of roasting meat on a spit.
meanings.sent1: The chef demonstrated the mechoui technique by slowly turning the meat over the fire.
meanings.sent2: During the camping trip, they took turns rotating the mechoui on the spit.
meanings.sent3: The mechoui competition at the fair had contestants racing to see who could roast the meat the fastest.
meanings.sent4: The mechoui process required patience and skill to ensure the meat was cooked to perfection.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the sizzling mechoui on the spit was music to their ears.
